personal.name: Said Mustafa
personal.title: AI & ML Specialist | DevOps Engineer
personal.bio: AI and Cloud ML Specialist with 2+ years of experience developing secure, scalable cloud solutions. Skilled in optimizing machine learning workflows and deploying models efficiently on cloud platforms.

experience.title: Cloud Machine Learning Specialist
description: Architected and managed AWS infrastructure for high-performance AI applications with 99.9% uptime
Developed and deployed ML models using MLflow and fine-tuned LLMs for production environments
Implemented RAG systems and built intelligent agent-based systems for enterprise clients
Automated data processing pipelines and optimized machine learning workflows

experience.title: Intern Penetration Tester
description: Conducted penetration testing and security audits using Burp Suite and Metasploit
Automated security tasks with Python and Bash scripting
Presented complex security concepts to non-technical stakeholders

experience.title: Freelance Script Writer
description: Developed automation scripts for Linux systems and server management
Applied web scraping techniques with BeautifulSoup and Scrapy for data collection
Created an AI-integrated trading bot using Python and TensorFlow
Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning algorithms
Focused on Cloud Computing architectures and distributed systems
Studied Cybersecurity principles and penetration testing methodologies
Completed capstone project on AI-powered cloud security solutions
